name: The [REDACTED] Catacombs
description:
Fight strange creatures in this momentum-based shooter platformer! Strange monsters appear from lamps in mysterious catacombs, and you must utilize three different guns to kill them. Use the knockback of your own weapons to propel yourself around levels to create shortcuts or find collectables, all while delving deeper into the catacombs.

This game was made for a class project in 2022. There is a tutorial as well as three levels, and it should be completable in 10-20 minutes.
